class controller.controller_menu.MenuController(main)[source]

Bases: object

Menu controller class.

This class is responsible for controlling the menus in the application. It adds menus to the main window and connects actions to them.

__init__(self, main)[source]

Initialize the MenuController instance.

main

The main window instance.
